title: Rudy Giuliani is looking for a defense lawyer: report
text: Rudy Giuliani is now looking for a defense attorney, CNN reported Wednesday night. Giuliani, who is President Donald Trump's personal attorney, recently parted ways with his lawyer, John Sale, saying he had no need for a defense attorney, though he told CNN last week he would need one if Democrats take him to court over his refusal to comply with Congressional subpoenas. Citing multiple sources, CNN said Giuliani has been approaching defense attorneys about potential representation, though he did not comment on the matter to CNN. Meanwhile, two associates of Giuliani, Lev Parnas and Igor Fruman, pleaded not guilty Wednesday to charges of illegal campaign contributions, and Parnas's lawyer suggested the White House could invoke presidential privilege over evidence in the case.
